page.title: 14New housing in Clacton
page.content: Our house was built in two back gardens and we designed it. When the plans were finished the brickies came in and dug the foundations and built the walls. The door frames were put in and the lintel was put over the door frames and the window frames. When the brickies reached roof height the trusses came in. So did the water-proof sheets and tiles. After that the top floor came in and all the wooden beams were put up along with the floorboards. Then came the upper walls and ceiling. The plasterers were next and they did all the walls for us so we could move in. The house smelt different and new. It felt colder than it did in our old house. Men used to come in almost every day to do something different to the house but soon the house was finished. { }
